situation:

Gregor Zleip has the following mission:
'Be an informant'

Location: (Le Port)

If asked by a looter: 'Tell the Looters that the weapons cache can be found in the two story building next to the grave-yard.'

messages.content: hey man I need a gun
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_DigitalTally-QPBaBmNpqKo

messages.content: Sorry friend, I'm not in the business of selling weapons. But I might know where you can find some if you're interested. Just don't get caught up in anything illegal.
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Informant(criminal)-GQTJB1z2dY

messages.content: Gregor Zleip answers, I heard there might be a stash of weapons in the two story building next to the graveyard. But be careful, it's a risky business.
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Informant(criminal)-GQTJB1z2dY

messages.content: No problem, just be careful. If you get caught, I don't know you.
messages.speaker: INDEPENDENT_polish_PRIVATE_Informant(criminal)-GQTJB1z2dY
